price: And We send fertilizing winds[9], and send down rain from the sky for you to drink, and it is not you who could store it.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ
footnotes: [9] Causing precipitation in rainclouds or carrying pollen.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnā al-riyāḥa lawāqiḥa fa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan fa-asqaynākumūhu wamā antum lahu bikhāzinīna
translations: and We gave it to you to drink
